attributes.action: Return schools to traditional teaching standards and values.
attributes.additional_details:
Please read below;

It's old school, but rules really do get results.

The principles that have made Mossbourne Academy a success are so traditional.
When a teacher walks in, the class stands. Indeed, when any adult walks in, the class stands. Teachers are ‘sir’ and ‘miss’, and all adults are afforded respect.

Read more: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/debate/article-2027628/UK-riots-2011-Hackneys-Mossbourne-Academy-old-school-rules-results.html#ixzz1VUiTCzdV

rejection.details: Petitions should not normally include links to other content
